subject: Re: Newspaper Advertisement | 25th AGM | One 97 Communications Limited
description:
Hi Sarika, Geetika & Hemlata,

Pls review. 

Best Regards
Kartik Jain
Senior Manager - Secretarial Team
www.paytm.com



On Tue, Aug 5, 2025 at 1:36 PM Zeeshan Ekram <zeeshan.ekram@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Kartik/Shivam,

Please refer to this doc for Hindi translation of the Notice Ad.
We have encountered an issue with the advertisement size. The current text, especially the Hindi version, is not fitting within the allocated dimensions. Please connect with @Rakesh to solve the issue.

On Tue, Aug 5, 2025 at 11:48 AM Zeeshan Ekram <zeeshan.ekram@paytm.com> wrote:
+Rakesh 

On Mon, Aug 4, 2025 at 2:04 PM Kartik Jain <kartik1.jain@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Zeeshan,

As discussed, PFA the draft of post-dispatch advertisement to be published in English & Hindi versions on August 06, 2025.

Best Regards
Kartik Jain
Senior Manager - Secretarial Team
www.paytm.com



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Kartik Jain <kartik1.jain@paytm.com>
Date: Mon, Aug 4, 2025 at 12:55 AM
Subject: Re: Newspaper Advertisement | 25th AGM | One 97 Communications Limited
To: Kaustubh Fuloriya <kaustubh.fuloriya@paytm.com>, Shivam Baijal <shivam.baijal@paytm.com>
Cc: Suraj Shahi <suraj.shahi@paytm.com>, Anshu Tiwari <anshu.tiwari@paytm.com>, Neha Agarwalla <neha.agarwalla@paytm.com>, Anand Hirvey <anand.hirvey@paytm.com>, Aviral Tyagi <aviral.tyagi@paytm.com>, Geetika Joshi <geetika.joshi@paytm.com>, Yogesh Sharma <yogesh12.sharma@paytm.com>, Sunil Bansal <sunil1.bansal@paytm.com>, Sarika Singla <m-sarika.singla@ocltp.com>, <zeeshan.ekram@paytm.co>, Prakhar Kant Jain <prakhar.jain@paytm.com>, Harbir Singh Rathi <harbir.rathi@paytm.com>, Alekh Khanna <alekh.khanna@paytm.com>, Hemlata Mishra <hemlata2.mishra@paytm.com>


Hi Kaustubh,

PFA post-dispatch advertisement for your reference. Kindly share the creative for the same & also arrange for its Hindi version.

@Shivam Baijal We will get it published on Wednesday, August 06, 2025 newspapers, as intimated earlier. Pls do the needful.

Best Regards
Kartik Jain
Senior Manager - Secretarial Team
www.paytm.com



On Fri, Aug 1, 2025 at 2:22 PM Kartik Jain <kartik1.jain@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Kaustubh,

This is fine. Pls align for Hindi version as per our discussion.

Best Regards
Kartik Jain
Senior Manager - Secretarial Team
www.paytm.com



On Fri, 1 Aug 2025 at 2:18 PM, Kaustubh Fuloriya <kaustubh.fuloriya@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Karthik,

Sharing the revised Pre-dispatch newspaper ad for your internal view.


--
Thanks & Regard
Kaustubh Fuloriya
 www.paytm.com


On Fri, Aug 1, 2025 at 10:48 AM Alekh Khanna <alekh.khanna@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Shivam,

PO has been released to the agency. 

On Wed, Jul 30, 2025 at 12:02 PM Shivam Baijal <shivam.baijal@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Alekh,

Please find the approved PR number.

OCL0PR100057822

Warm Regards,
Shivam


On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 at 6:04 PM Suraj Shahi <suraj.shahi@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Shivam,

Please refer to PR Ref no. OCL0PR100057822 for newspaper advertisements.

On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 at 4:52 PM Shivam Baijal <shivam.baijal@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Suraj,

As we discussed, please create the PR for ₹64,000 plus taxes. For your reference, I've attached last year's PO.

Here's a breakdown of the tentative costs:

* Print cost: ₹62,000
* Service cost: ₹2,000

The last year's PO number:-  2300123158.


Warm Regards,
Shivam


On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 at 4:35 PM Shivam Baijal <shivam.baijal@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Suraj,

As discussed, kindly share the approved PR.

Warm Regards,
Shivam


On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 at 3:46 PM Alekh Khanna <alekh.khanna@paytm.com> wrote:
@Shivam Baijal As we spoke, please share the approved PR. RFQ will be floated through the online portal. 

On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 at 11:34 AM Suraj Shahi <suraj.shahi@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Kaustubh,

Regarding the creative for the newspaper advertisements, please refer to ticket #26435. 

On Mon, Jul 28, 2025 at 11:51 PM Kartik Jain <kartik1.jain@paytm.com> wrote:
Hi Shivam & Neha,
 
As part of AGM's yearly exercise, we would require publication of 2 (two) newspaper advertisements, in relation to the forthcoming Annual General Meeting of the Company, in coming days (tentatively planned for August 02, 2025 & August 06, 2025). The size of the advertisement(s) would approximately be:
 
  1. Pre-dispatch newspaper advertisement – 19’ h x 12’ w (TD: August 02, 2025)- Both Hindi & English
  2. Post-dispatch newspaper advertisement - 20’ h x 12’ w (TD: August 06, 2025) Both Hindi & English
The advertisements will be in black and white in all editions of Financial Express and Jansatta. Request you to get the estimate from the vendor, per sq. cm (along with service charge and tax).
 
Attaching the previous year's pre & post-dispatch newspaper advertisements for your reference.
 
@kaustubh.fuloriya@paytm.com as done last year, we would require a creative as per the attached previous pre & post-dispatch newspaper advertisements (both in hindi & english). The same will also require translation in hindi. Please assist.

@Suraj Shahi Pls look into PR & PO and also for raising the request through the ticket system as required in this regard. 

@Anshu Tiwari Please coordinate with Suraj Shahi & work accordingly in order to meet the above timelines.

Please feel free to connect for any further clarification.

Note: The suggested timelines are tentative & may vary subject to any management advisory.

Best Regards
Kartik Jain
Senior Manager - Secretarial Team
www.paytm.com



--
Thanks & Regards,
Suraj Shahi
Secretarial
+91 8860112255

www.paytm.com  


--
Regards,

Alekh Khanna
Purchase Team
+91 9319155373

NOTE:- As per the policy, commercials are to be discussed only with Paytm's Procurement Team. Not adhering to the policy may lead to disqualification. Also, the work can only be initiated post Purchase Order is released and agreement is signed (if required). Not adhering to this, may lead to vendor disqualification. 

Kindly submit a signed estimate on your company's letterhead, clearly outlining the detailed scope of work and associated costs (per unit or total) for each project. Please note that without a signed estimate, we will be unable to proceed with the issuance of a Purchase Order or any payments.

If a formal agreement has already been signed that includes a detailed scope of work and commercials, separate estimates will not be required. 

For quick resolution of your payment status related queries please write mail to vendorhelpdesk@paytm.com

For Procure Tool related queries, please reach out to procuresupport@paytm.com


--
Thanks & Regards,
Suraj Shahi
Secretarial
+91 8860112255

www.paytm.com  


--
Regards,

Alekh Khanna
Purchase Team
+91 9319155373

NOTE:- As per the policy, commercials are to be discussed only with Paytm's Procurement Team. Not adhering to the policy may lead to disqualification. Also, the work can only be initiated post Purchase Order is released and agreement is signed (if required). Not adhering to this, may lead to vendor disqualification. 

Kindly submit a signed estimate on your company's letterhead, clearly outlining the detailed scope of work and associated costs (per unit or total) for each project. Please note that without a signed estimate, we will be unable to proceed with the issuance of a Purchase Order or any payments.

If a formal agreement has already been signed that includes a detailed scope of work and commercials, separate estimates will not be required. 

For quick resolution of your payment status related queries please write mail to vendorhelpdesk@paytm.com

For Procure Tool related queries, please reach out to procuresupport@paytm.com


--
Regards
Zeeshan Ekram
Marketing - Design
#9971302960



--
Regards
Zeeshan Ekram
Marketing - Design
#9971302960
